QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Badlands!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Gek Nozzlerocket at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.$B$BYour help is needed to survey the damage done by Deathwing, and the disposition of Horde forces in the Badlands.$B$BGek has agreed to provide transportation to the Badlands via rocket, in exchange for your help. Look for him at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Gek Nozzlerocket at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.RewardText: You must be here to help Fuselight! Let's get you to the Badlands right away.
